title: Host Setup
welcomeSubtitle: Let's get you set up to start hosting guests
promptMessage: Set up your hosting policies and preferences to start accepting bookings
setupCompleteMessage: Your host setup is complete! You can now start accepting bookings.
cancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel? You can complete setup later, but you won't be able to accept bookings until setup is finished.

calendar.message: Complete your host setup to manage your booking calendar

profile.title: Setup Required
profile.message: Complete your host setup to access your host profile settings
